featuremodel.name: stackattardi
featuremodel.feature: Merge3(InputColumn(POSTAG, Stack[2]), InputColumn(POSTAG, Stack[1]), InputColumn(POSTAG, Stack[0]))
Merge3(InputColumn(POSTAG, Stack[1]), InputColumn(POSTAG, Stack[0]), InputColumn(POSTAG, Lookahead[0]))
Merge3(InputColumn(POSTAG, Stack[0]), InputColumn(POSTAG, Lookahead[0]), InputColumn(POSTAG, Lookahead[1]))
Merge3(InputColumn(POSTAG, Lookahead[0]), InputColumn(POSTAG, Lookahead[1]), InputColumn(POSTAG, Lookahead[2]))
Merge3(InputColumn(POSTAG, Stack[0]), OutputColumn(DEPREL, ldep(Stack[0])), OutputColumn(DEPREL, rdep(Stack[0])))
Merge3(InputColumn(POSTAG, Stack[1]), OutputColumn(DEPREL, ldep(Stack[1])), OutputColumn(DEPREL, rdep(Stack[1])))
